description: This action sets the property mappings for the specified hypervisor. A hypervisor property mapping displays the relationship of entity properties available from the on-premises hypervisor to the properties available in Amazon Web Services.

parameters.name: HypervisorArn
parameters.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the hypervisor.

parameters.name: IamRoleArn
parameters.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the IAM role.

parameters.name: VmwareToAwsTagMappings
parameters.description: This action requests the mappings of on-premises VMware tags to the Amazon Web Services tags. (dict) --- This displays the mapping of on-premises VMware tags to the corresponding Amazon Web Services tags. The key part of the Amazon Web Services tag's key-value pair. The value part of the Amazon Web Services tag's key-value pair. The is the category of VMware. This is the user-defined name of a VMware tag.

nested_params.name: AwsTagKey
nested_params.description: The key part of the Amazon Web Services tag's key-value pair.

nested_params.name: AwsTagValue
nested_params.description: The value part of the Amazon Web Services tag's key-value pair.

nested_params.name: VmwareCategory
nested_params.description: The is the category of VMware.

nested_params.name: VmwareTagName
nested_params.description: This is the user-defined name of a VMware tag.

nested_items.name: HypervisorArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the hypervisor.
